item.title: ByteactHosting-free hosting
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: Now, I am here at ByteactHosting. My blog was moved into this free web hosting. Free Web Hosting Plan * 800MB 1GB (1024MB) of webspace * 30GB of monthly transfer * 10 MySQL databases * 10 Addon domains * 10 Addon subdomains * 10 Parked domains * POP E-mail account (catch-all) * Direct FTP access * PHP support * NO FORCED ADS! It is close to the last one I
